thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 290 2
thread.title: David Walker
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 David Walker

author: David Walker
title: David Walker
text: Of all the shopping I have done with Banggood I have only had 2 problems that I can't say were Banggood's fault (shipping, ect). But upon contacting Banggood the problems were corrected to my satisfaction promptly. Missing item in last order was taken care of by Sunshine immediately. A couple of questions, Item number and order number, and a replacement is on the way. In my opinion Banggood is a reputable company and I will continue to shop there.
